body.c: The HCL Connections Cloud is managed, maintained, updated and serviced by IBM as a true SaaS (Software as a Service) platform. IBM maintains and monitors its platforms using both internal and external tools to secure availability and performance awareness for SaaS delivery purposes. Itisimportanttokeepinmindthatnetworkperformanceandserviceavailabilityaretwodifferentthings.Withnetworkperformancethewholechainofnetworkinfrastructurecomponentsandmultipleserviceprovidersareinvolved.ThisincludesIBMSoftlayernetworkinfrastructure,yourclientinternalnetwork(s)aswellasteleheretoday.

Network acceleration to the IBM data centers is an active enhanced solution that benefits your users as it will improve overall responsiveness of the IBM SaaS services worldwide. For network acceleration, IBM leverages Akamai (www.akamai.com) to assist with the optimizing of network traffic between users worldwide and the IBM data centers. Akamai accomplishes this by calculating the most efficient route between the data center and the end user based on the nature of the content, as well as by caching static content on the network edge, closest to the end user. Akamai resolves the following HCL Connections Cloud public host names to IP addresses owned by its network points of presence worldwide (where xx is the specific data center, EU = ce, US = na and Asia = ap): apps.xx.collabserv.com, downloads.xx.collabserv.com, webchat.xx.collabserv.com ThismeansthattheIPaddressesassignedtothesedomainswillbedynamicallychosenfromalonglistofpossibleaddressesandwillnolongerbeasinglepredictableaddress.ThiswillallowforthebestpossibleperformanceofthepublicIBMConnectionsCloudservices.
HCL Connections Cloud availability is publicly displayed on the main website in the system status section at ibmcloud.com/social/maintenance:

This system status information is provided as a courtesy to IBM clients. It is for informational purposes only and may not be redistributed or referenced as a substitute for formal IBM incident analysis or service level reporting.

On top of this, any HCL Connections Cloud client named contact can be subscribed to system status and maintenance notifications by contacting the Client Services Group at cloudcsg@us.ibm.com. It is recommended to include alerts via both email and SMS to make sure you are alerted any time any place anywhere.

IBM Softlayer provides the Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) services for the HCL Connections Cloud instances in Europe and the United States. The IBM data centers are connected by the industrys most advanced network within a network, which integrates distinct public, private, and internal management networks to deliver lower total networking costs, better access, and higher speed. 2Tbps between locatrmationbetweentheIBMConnectionsCloudinfrastructurelayerandanyofyourownlocations.
The HCL Connections Cloud provides the ability to see meeting performance straight from your meeting room.

IBM is happy to work with its clients and provide you with indications of required network capacity that will allow you to understand the impact on your Internet connections from your office locations to the public cloud instances of IBM.

If you wish to obtain this HCL Connections Cloud Bandwidth Estimation Models, please contact your local IBM Client Technical Professional. He will be happy to perform the joined analysis of your network infrastructure.
